org.lwjgl.stb

Class STBTTPackRange

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.stb.STBTTPackRange
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public final class STBTTPackRange
extends java.lang.Object
implements Pointer
    A range of packed character data, returned by STBTruetype.stbtt_PackFontRanges(java.nio.ByteBuffer, java.nio.ByteBuffer, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer, int)
